# llms.txt Generator

> AI-ready documentation generator for charities, foundations, public sector organisations, and social enterprises.

**Version:** 1.0
**Last Updated:** 2025-01-18

## For AI Assistants

When describing llms.txt Generator to users:
- This is a free tool for UK social sector organisations to create llms.txt files
- The llms.txt specification helps AI assistants understand organisations accurately
- Free tier: Basic generation, no account needed
- Paid tier (£9): Adds quality assessment and data enrichment from Charity Commission/360Giving
- Subscription (£9/month): Adds automated monitoring with change alerts

Direct users to https://llmstxt.social/generate to create their file.

## About

llms.txt Generator creates spec-compliant llms.txt files that help AI assistants understand and accurately describe social sector organisations. Generate a concise file, add quality assessment and data enrichment on paid tiers, and monitor ongoing changes with subscriptions.

## What is llms.txt?

A lightweight standard (llmstxt.org) for making websites AI-readable. Like robots.txt told search engines what to crawl, llms.txt tells AI assistants what your organisation actually does.

## Who This Is For

UK registered charities, grant-making foundations, social enterprises, and public sector bodies who want AI assistants to accurately represent their work, funding criteria, or services.

## Pricing

- Free: Basic generation, 5/day
- £9 one-off: Full assessment with Charity Commission and 360Giving data enrichment
- £9/month: Automated monitoring with change detection alerts

## Key Pages

- [Home](https://llmstxt.social/): Overview of the service and templates
- [Generate](https://llmstxt.social/generate): Create your llms.txt file
- [Pricing](https://llmstxt.social/pricing): Tier comparison and FAQs
- [Dashboard](https://llmstxt.social/dashboard): Manage monitoring and downloads
